faqs.question: How do I reset my password?
faqs.answer: To reset your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. Enter your email address and follow the instructions sent to your inbox. For security reasons, password reset links expire after 24 hours.

faqs.question: Can I download course content for offline viewing?
faqs.answer: Yes, premium subscribers can download course videos and materials for offline access through our mobile app. Downloaded content remains available for 30 days and can be renewed by connecting to the internet.
